description.name: AI Domain Finder
description.tagline: AI-powered domain name suggestions using Google Gemini
description.long: Generate creative, brandable domain name suggestions using Google Gemini AI. The module intelligently suggests domain names based on user searches, with full support for internationalized domain names (IDN) and smart rate limiting to stay within API quotas.
features: AI-powered domain suggestions using Google Gemini API
Support for multiple Gemini models (2.0 Flash, 2.5 Flash, 2.5 Pro)
Full IDN support with smart detection
Customizable AI prompt with variable substitution
Automatic Punycode conversion for WHOIS lookups
